text: PRINCE Harry and Meghan Markle have embarked on their first day as husband and wife, and there ’ s no rest for the world ’ s favourite newlyweds. A packed schedule lies ahead for the Duke and Duchess of Sussex, who have both made clear their intention to use their platform to make a difference. Meghan, 36, unveiled her intentions for her role with a webpage on the monarchy ’ s official website. It displays a celebrated quote from one of her speeches, “ I am proud to be a woman and a feminist, ” as well as detailing her humanitarian achievements and plans to assist the Queen in royal duties in the United Kingdom and overseas. It describes her work with the Myna Mahila Foundation, which empowers women in Mumbai through access to menstrual hygiene products and employment opportunities
